direction.raw_text: : Go. Kane depresses the detonator. There are two large explosions, followed by several smaller ones. Part of the Necropolis wall is blasted out. Several members of the posse retreat. Eigerman pulls his pistol.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [cont.]: You there, stand your ground! [fires a warning shot] Stand your ground, damn you! The defectors stop. Several more chain explosions in Necropolis.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SCENE DELETED 212. SCENE DELETED 213. INT. BELOW MIDIAN Narcisse is leading a group of child monsters, as the explosions bring earth plunging down from the ceiling. Babies cry. Monsters scream. We see several creatures howling in bestial terror. Babette is separated from Narcisse's group by falling earth, nearly trampled in the chaos. She is picked up by the dog-faced man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : I want my mother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : We'll find her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. PELOQUIN'S CHAMBER NIGHT Peloquin squats on the step overlooking the fire-pit, listening to the sound of invasion from above. There is a mixture of fear and rage on his face. In the darkness opposite, Kinski.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : We began this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : I just wanted meat. I didn't know he was going to cause this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : There were prophesies. The seventh saviour.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : I didn't believe the prophesies and I didn't obey the Law. You want to see me bleed for it? All right, I'll bleed. He exits the chamber.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NECROPOLIS GATES/COMMAND POST NIGHT Smoke billows over the walls. Eigerman moves closer to the gates, listening to the wild cries from inside. He grabs Ashberry by the collar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : That sound like a heavenly choir to you, Padre?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : I have to see! Ashberry shakes himself free and heads through the gates, into the Necropolis. Eigerman turns to the others, lights a cigar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Pettine!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Chief?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : We're moving in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [locks and loads his machine-gun]: Yes, sir! [turns - addresses the posse] We're movin' in! Car engines are revved, headlights turned on, piercing the smoke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NECROPOLIS NIGHT Ashberry wanders through the Necropolis as the Breed begin to emerge on every side. The air is full of sad, melodious sounds, like whale-song. Ghostly forms appear from the smoke and drift towards him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [in awe]: Dear Lord... Some of the creatures brush him as they drift by: their strange beauty entrances him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Dear Lord ...Forgive me... There are images here which have the flavour of Christian iconography. Mother and child. A man bleeding from his brow. A creature with a halo of smoke. He wanders on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SCENE DELETED 217. EXT. OUTSIDE NECROPOLIS NIGHT Decker watches impassively. Joyce moves towards the gate. As he reaches it an extraordinary creature appears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : My God. It means no harm. Joyce steps aside and the creature moves off into the night. We cut back to Decker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [V.O.]: Don't deny me Philip...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Soon. I promise. Decker hears shouts to his flank, steps back, out of sight and sees Lori and Rachel emerge from a hiding place, Lori trying to restrain Rachel from going in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Babette!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Rachel, no! Rachel breaks away and runs towards the Necropolis. Lori is alone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [V.O.]: Now, perfect, finish her. She's the only one who knows about us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : What about Boone?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [V.O.]: Boone's a monster. They all die tonight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [smiles]: All right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [V.O.]: Quickly, Philip, we'll lose her. The briefcase is opened. The light of distant fires flicker on the mask.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SCENE DELETED 218A. INT. NECROPOLIS Boone and Narcisse lead the column of Breed, children and babies up from underground into the Necropolis itself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Hurry up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Is this wise? Coming above ground?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : If we stay below they'll slaughter us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : This is their territory.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : No. The night's ours. Now get the rest of the children up here, I'm going to find a clear way through! He heads away, leaving a frightened group of Breed and children.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. GATES OF NECROPOLIS NIGHT Peloquin appears overground, scanning the destruction before racing off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. GATES OF NECROPOLIS NIGHT Eigerman addresses the assembled posse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : They're coming out, and they're armed, so watch yourselves. It's a fucking freak-show in there! We're not taking prisoners! It's us or them! Let's clean up! The engines rev, and the posse charges the gates. The lead vehicle, driven by a manic, grinning Kane, rams the gates, and crashes through.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Us or them! Us or them! On the other side of the gates, Peloquin appears in Kane's headlights.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Shit! Peloquin jumps up into the air as the car careers towards him. We see him somersault in the air. Kane hears him land on the car roof. We see Peloquin on the roof, bend over the windshield. His face appears in front of a panicking Kane, the mouth suddenly opening grotesquely wide. Kane slams the breaks on. Peloquin is thrown off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Eat dirt, fucker! Peloquin is thrown to the ground, his face caught in the blaze of headlights as Kane's vehicle revs and drives at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [ecstatic]: Yeah! His momentum carries the car towards the crater blown in the ground. Kane's pleasure turns to horror.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Oh shit! Shit! He turns to swerve, but too late, the car heads over the edge. Wounded, Peloquin crawls off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. MIDIAN CORE Dirt falls from the roof. Headlights appear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. KANE'S CAR NIGHT The car slides into the earth. The guns stacked behind him fall forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Oh my Jesus!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. MIDIAN CORE Kane's car drops through the roof of Midian, falling through the core, breaking bridges as it falls. Breed are thrown off walkways to their deaths. The car strikes the top of Baphomet's chamber and a plume of fire, followed by several small explosions, marks Kane's death.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. BAPHOMET'S CHAMBER The explosions rock the chamber. Dirt falls. Baphomet looks towards the roof, with great sadness on his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. INITIATION CHAMBER Boone enters the initiation chamber. Lylesburg is standing beside the bowl of Baphomet's blood, which is bubbling furiously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : What the hell are you doing down here? We need help!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : This was intended.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Fuck that! We're not going to lie down and die.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : It's Baphomet's will. He's going to destroy the Naturals, and us. Everything, in one last fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : How do you know?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Look for yourself. He points to the bowl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : It's going to blow?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : He'll destroy his own people?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Better it ends quickly. We can't escape them. We remind them of the darkness in themselves. They hate that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : So did I. I learned better. We can make it out. But I need fighters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : We're not warriors...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : What about the Berserkers?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : They're uncontrollable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : All the better. Let them out. Don't just stand there! We're the tribes of the moon, remember? Doubt and fear mingle in Lylesburg's look, but he finally nods his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : I'll release the Berserkers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Be quick. We haven't got forever. Yet. Lylesburg smiles. Boone leaves. The Drummer is at the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : You come with me. The rest of you get out of here. He exits with the Drummer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. GATES NIGHT The posse enter in large numbers, firing to left and right. We see Breed shot down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NECROPOLIS NIGHT Boone races to the entrance, to see Eigerman's posse moving towards the Necropolis. One of the posse has a flame thrower. He burns up the foliage. From Boone's P.O.V. we view the enemy: grinning sweating monsters. There's no way out in this direction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. GATES NIGHT Lori looks towards the conflagration.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Oh Jesus, Boone. Behind her, we see a familiar, masked figure approaching: Decker. She doesn't hear him over the shouts and screams.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NECROPOLIS NIGHT One of the posse fires a rocket into a giant Breed who explodes. Boone reacts with horror at the destruction. When he turns back he sees Breed watching too, defenceless.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Arm yourselves! Defend yourselves! You're not cattle, for Christ's sake. They don't have any right to kill you! He races back the way he came, and pulls coffins from the walls, tearing their lids off with supernatural strength. He breaks the wood into clubs. The Breed watch him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Weapons! You need weapons or it's over! One or two understand, and do as he's doing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : All of you! They do as he orders.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Stop them getting in! They'll kill the children!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. GATES NIGHT Lori turns to see Decker appearing from the darkness. He attacks her, cutting her arm. She backs away before he can strike a second time, retreating towards the gates. Then she turns and walks through the reeds; Decker on her heels.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NECROPOLIS NIGHT The posse led by Pettine invade the entrances to the Necropolis, engaging in hand-to-hand combat with the Breed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NECROPOLIS NIGHT Boone races through the Necropolis, finding that other posse members are breaking in from other sides.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : They're everywhere!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NECROPOLIS NIGHT The Nightbreed children hear the sound of slaughter approaching. One of the Breed with enormous, dark eyes, speaks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : We can't stay here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : He told us to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : He can't help us. He's too late.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NECROPOLIS NIGHT We see the posse shooting Breed as they move towards the children. Several are entering doorways that lead underground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. MIDIAN CORE Posse enter the core, firing at anything that moves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. BERSERKERS' CORRIDOR Lylesburg, his leg broken, is hobbling towards the Berserkers' chamber, as the sound of gunfire gets nearer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NECROPOLIS NIGHT Narcisse still keeps an increasingly panicked group of Breed and children from scattering. Pettine and two bloodied, grinning posse appear through the smoke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Look what we got here! A freak-show nursery school. The group back away, but two more posse members appear, one with a flame-thrower, another with grenades.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Say goodnight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [from above]: Goodnight. Pettine looks up. Framed against the stars, Boone. He drops on Pettine breaking the man's neck. Then he and Narcisse lead the attack against the posse, dispatching them all.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : What way's safe?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : The west wall! But be quick! I'm going after Eigerman.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NECROPOLIS Leroy and Lude hide around the corner of a mausoleum. Two posse members are beating a Breed up with their rifle butts. Leroy heads out to help.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : What's the plan?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : The usual. You take the big guy. [he yells to the Naturals] Hey! They turn. Leroy raises his hands in surrender.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : I wouldn't do that if I were you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Give me a good reason why not.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : I'll give you two! The snakes emerge from his body.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Shit! He raises his gun, but Lude flips over his head, landing behind him and in front of the 2nd posse member. Lude's eyes blaze.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Pretty gun. The 2nd posse member looks down at his hands. The gun is covered in snakes. He drops the gun. When he looks up Lude has gone. He turns again, backing off towards a monument. Lude is there, a living devil hidden amongst the carved variety. He takes hold of the man, turning him round and driving his horns into the man's neck. He staggers back, blood pouring from the opened wounds. Leroy, meanwhile, draws the 1st into an embrace. The snakes strike. Poisoned, the man dies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Look at this mess.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Just like the old days.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NECROPOLIS Kane leads two cops through the mayhem, firing to right and left. He shoots a Breed against one of the mausoleums. Blood is spattered on his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Look at these bastards. Fucking freaks. He wipes the blood from his face. Then he takes off his spectacles, and wipes the blood off them. As he does so 1st cop yelps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Yow!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : What? 1st cop pulls a quill from the back of his neck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Where the fuck did that come from? Kane puts his spectacles back on, and sees Shuna Sassi in one of the mausoleums. She moves sexily in the shadows. Kane grins and starts to approach.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Wait...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : It's just a girl... 1st cop is still rubbing the back of his neck. He is looking sick now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : I don't...feel...so...good... Kane pushes the mausoleum grille open, as the 1st cop kneels over, face down. The 2nd cop kneels to help him. Meanwhile, Kane has stepped into the mausoleum. Shuna is in the corner, her spines covered with the swaths of red cloth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : It's OK, Baby. He lowers his gun. Outside the 2nd cop turns the 1st over. He is frothing at the mouth, his face blotchy and sweating.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Oh shit! Kane! Inside again, Shuna drops her cloth and leaps at Kane. 2nd cop now approaches the mausoleum.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Kane? As he reaches the threshold, Kane staggers out, his body and face pierced in dozens of places with Shuna's spines. He reaches for 2nd cop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Keep away from me! In panic, he fires at Kane, who falls to the ground. As the smoke clears a hand appears and strokes his cheek. He turns. It's Shuna. He screams, and falls to the ground at her feet, his arm covered in spines. He twitches, and dies. She drops her swath of red cloth over the faces of the three dead men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NECROPOLIS GATES NIGHT Cut to Eigerman's leering, grinning face as he fires at Breed. Ashberry emerges from the shadows and grabs him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: :. Please, you've got to stop...[takes out a pistol - points it) There's children down there, you're killing children!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Go ahead, faggot, [pauses contemptuously] You haven't got the balls to pull the trigger. Eigerman snatches the gun away and pistol-whips him to the ground. Eigerman draws a bead on Ashberry's forehead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [cont.]: Lemme show you how it's done... Nearby, Joyce sees them, draws his weapon, ready to fire at Eigerman when a shadow passes over him. He ducks, his expression changing from horror to wonder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [eyes closed-hands clasped fervently]: Father, I am heartily sorry for having offended thee...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Sorry, Padre. Nobody's listening...[prepares to shoot]
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [V.O.]: I hear you. Eigerman turns, looks and fires as Boone leaps at him. He roars, effortlessly picks Eigerman up and body-slams him against the wall of Midian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [cont.] [to Ashberry]: Get up!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Don't kill me!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Run, go on! We don't like priests here. Ashberry pulls at his collar, tears it off, clings to Boone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : No, no, take me, I have to see. Boone gets a sense of his commitment. He heads off. Ashberry follows. And, at a distance, so does Joyce.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NECROPOLIS NIGHT Boone races through the walkways, Ashberry following. There is pitched hand-to-hand battle on every side. Nightbreed are prevailing in some; in others the mob repeats scenes from the history we witnessed earlier: Breed being beaten or burned to death, impaled on stakes. Boone assists some along the way, pulling off their assailants.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NECROPOLIS GATES NIGHT Lori enters the Necropolis, running through the smoke. Decker follows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Boone! Boone!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SCENE DELETED 229. INT. BERSERKERS' CORRIDOR Lylesburg has reached the door of the Berserkers' chamber. He puts the key in the lock. A shout stops him turning it. He looks towards a man with a laser-sight rifle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Yo! The light from the rifle plays on Lylesburg's robes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Watch the pretty light. It moves up towards Lylesburg's face, until it's centred on his forehead. The man fires, killing his victim. Lylesburg falls, hanging from the door by the key chain around his neck. His many eyes have opened. The man grins. Then hears a noise behind him. He turns to see the Ferreol Vees, creatures like Manta Rays that glide through the air, appearing around the corner. They swoop towards him, separating. The middle one opens its mouth as it strikes his face. He is eclipsed. When the Vees pass on down the corridor, the man's face is a bloody wreck. He falls to the floor, just out of reach of the Berserkers, who roar their frustration. 230. INT. MIDIAN CORE Boone and Ashberry are on one of the walkways, which are swinging violently. Boone hears the Berserkers' roar, and heads towards the door that leads into their corridor, leaving Ashberry on the bridge, tears pouring down his face. Then he follows Boone. As he reaches the ledge he looks back to see a fabulous beast, the Mezzick-Muul, and its beautiful rider, Diadaria, appear. He watches, awestruck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NECROPOLIS NIGHT Lori races through the smoke and horror of the Necropolis, as Decker follows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. BERSERKERS' CHAMBER Boone reaches the door. Lylesburg is dead. Boone pulls the key from off Lylesburg's neck, and pulls the corpse aside. Then he turns the key in the lock. The door opens. A rush of filthy wind emerges from the chamber beyond. Then the Berserkers appear: lethal brutes, all teeth, armour and muscle. One of them, Ghost, takes hold of Boone, and there's a beat when it seems certain to dispatch him. Then a burst of light from Baphomet's chamber spills over them, and there's a roar from their unseen God. They let Boone go, and they're away. Boone looks towards the chamber, then heads back towards the surface.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NECROPOLIS NIGHT Tommy leads a line of five posse members who have cornered a number of wounded Breed against one of the walls. One of the creatures attempts to scramble away. Tommy guns him down. He turns to the other gunmen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Watch this! The two posse members prepare to kill the Breed. The ground around them begins to shudder, and a fist bursts out of the ground and grabs the leg of a posse member and drags him down. Another fist then bursts out of the ground. Then in silhouette the Berserkers climb out of the earth beside the posse. Two of the posse turn, and fire at the Berserkers, who advance through the hail of the bullets, and quickly dispatch the two gunmen. Tommy has begun to fire at the feet of the cornered Breed, obliging them to dance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [laughs]: Dance, fuckers! The display gets appreciative hoots and laughter from the three surviving posse members, who - like Tommy - are as yet unaware that the Berserkers are advancing on them. Tommy continues to fire at the ground around the Breed, as one by one his three companions are dispatched by the Berserkers. We close in on Tommy, whose face is suddenly spattered with blood. He stops firing. He looks round to find himself surrounded by Berserkers. The shadows fall over him. Their hands take hold of him. We see the shadow of what they do to him on the walls: his body is torn apart. We cut to the Berserkers. Ghost has Tommy's gun, with the hand still attached. He tosses it aside, roaring like King Kong. The wounded Breed hurry away as the Berserkers head off in search of new mischief.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NECROPOLIS NEAR THE GATES NIGHT With the tide turning inside the Necropolis, a disorganized retreat is underway. Eigerman is at the gate watching the remains of his 'army' staggering away. Joyce is watching the scene.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Stand your ground! Stand your ground! They've got to come this way. We can mow 'em down. He climbs up on a vehicle which is parked at the gates. In the driving seat is Gibbs. Beside him, a woman, her face smoke-stained, her expression near catatonic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Gibbs?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Sir?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Lights! Gibbs switches the lights on, to pierce the smoke. Bad move. The illumination shows the Berserkers appearing. They approach the vehicle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Shit! Eigerman jumps from the vehicle, as the retreating posse fire at the Berserkers. It's a useless response. Bloodied but unbowed, the Berserkers run at the vehicles. The woman throws herself out, but Gibbs isn't quick enough. One of the Berserkers pushes the vehicle up the wall of the Necropolis, and Blatz, a small, vicious creature, stamps on the roof. Inside, Gibbs cowers as the roof is beaten in. He is crushed. Joyce, who has been watching this entire scene, moves away from the gate towards the Necropolis. The fires are dying down somewhat, and an eerie half-light bathes the scene he moves through. A few surviving posse hurry away, firing at every movement in the shadows. Back at the gate we see one of the escaping Berserkers flip another car over, while his brothers dispatch posse members. The survivors simply drop their weapons and flee.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SCENE DELETED 237B. SCENE DELETED 238. INT. MAUSOLEUM NIGHT The dog-faced man lies dead at the door and beside him Babette, her face subtly bestial. Joyce hears Babette weeping; her cries hit him hard. He goes to her, gathers her up gently in his arms. Babette clings to him; he sees her arms are partially transformed into claws, but he keeps holding her. Boone emerges from the depths, into the wrecked mausoleum.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Boone...[he goes to them] Lori. She's hurt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Where? Babette points outside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NECROPOLIS NIGHT Lori runs, Decker follows, his steps steady, relentless and gaining. Lori takes another stride and the ground gives way beneath her. She slides down into the earth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NECROPOLIS NIGHT Boone is tracking them, Joyce following, carrying Babette, who has a vision.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Falling!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. BELOW MIDIAN Chaos, and collapse. Earth is falling all around. Lori picks herself up and finds her way back up is blocked by debris. She has no choice but to cross the swaying walkways, while the air thickens with dust and smoke. There are only one or two Breed left alive down here, desperately collecting their belongings. They exit the chamber leaving the smoking bowls...We track towards the bowls, as the contents brighten and bubble.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. BELOW MIDIAN Lori descends a flight of stairs, to find Peloquin badly wounded at the bottom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : It's all over. I didn't believe the prophesies and now it's all over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : What prophesies? Peloquin takes her arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : You want to see?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. ENTRANCE TO MURAL CHAMBER NIGHT Peloquin pushes Lori ahead of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : See? We track towards the mural. Lori can barely believe her eyes. Here, laid out on the walls, is a whole history; and featured amongst its more recent additions, the face of Boone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Yes, it's him. Boone squatting in front of his fire of love letters. Boone dead in the reeds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : All these years waiting for a saviour. But he hasn't saved us. He's destroyed us. I made him, and he's destroyed us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Made him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : The bite was mine. The bite that mocks death.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : That doesn't make him yours. I belong here on this wall, just as much as you do. Why aren't I here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : You're still a Natural. Go back while you've still got a life. Join your tribe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : That? My tribe? Not any longer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Then die with us. It's over. Peloquin exits. Lori looks back at the images on the walls once more. Then she exits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NECROPOLIS NIGHT Boone, Joyce and Babette approach the hole where Lori fell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Let me down. I can't go any further.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Why not?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [looking down into the hole]: Baphomet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [to Joyce]: Take her. Run. Joyce nods and moves off with her into the smoke. As she disappears, Decker steps forward from the smoke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Quite a dance, huh? Death everywhere and you and me in the middle. Catch! He throws the head of a Breed at Boone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Even the dead can die! Then Decker strikes out at him, slashing at Boone's face. Boone falls backwards. At the last moment he catches hold of Decker, pulling him down into the hole and together they tumble into the earth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SCENE DELETED 244. INT. MIDIAN Boone and Decker land on one of the rope bridges. Boone heads across it, pursued by Decker, who slashes at his neck, cutting him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Almost! Boone falls back. Decker closes on him, the knives at his neck. The force of his stabs, which miss Boone's neck, break the boards of the bridge. Boone braces his feet beneath Decker and tosses him over. Decker gets up and approaches him again, slashing the ropes of the bridge with his blades as he comes. The fighters connect and struggle, their violent motion carrying them over the edge of the bridge, dropping them down another level. Decker lands very heavily, and lies still. Boone gets up. His exit along the bridge in one direction is blocked. He has to step past Decker who doesn't move. Only when Boone has stepped beyond him does Decker get up, pursuing Boone across the bridge, and flinging one of the knives at his victim's back. The blade cuts straight through Boone, sticking out from his chest a good six inches. He turns, his fury transforming him into a more extreme creature. Decker comes at Boone with a second blade, slashing at Boone's neck. The battle carries them off the bridge onto the stairs. Decker takes hold of Boone's hair, preparing to deliver the coup de grace. Boone reaches for a weapon, finds a skull, and smashes it into the mask. Decker lets go. Boone tumbles off the stairs, falling face down on a card table. Decker follows down the stairs. Boone pulls the table off his chest, leaving the Ace of Hearts on the blade in his chest. Decker follows through, driving Boone back into one of the Breed's rooms, where the fight continues. Decker takes a whip from the wall and uses it to disarm Boone, who has snatched up a bone to defend himself with. Boone snatches up a second bone and retaliates, delivering blow after blow against Decker, eventually knocking the knife from his hand and driving him out on to the ledge once more. Decker teeters on the edge, now defenceless. Boone approaches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Want to dance? He snatches the mask off Decker's face and draws him close, impaling Decker on his own blade. Decker screams. Then Boone pushes him off the blade, and over the edge of the ledge. Decker falls. Boone stands on the ledge, and spits down at the corpse. As he does so he hears the same roar from Baphomet that called the Berserkers from harming him. Out of it, comes Baphomet's face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [V.O.]: Boone!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. LYLESBURG'S CHAMBER The chamber is empty of life. There are two or three corpses on the floor. We approach the central dais, on which is perched the statue of Baphomet, surrounded by six white heads. Momentarily, lines of light break from the statue's head and strike the white heads, which in turn begin to glow...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. VARIOUS CHAMBERS In the chambers we've seen before we see copies of the six statues, in front of which are bowls of Baphomet's fluid...They begin to glow, the brightness building. Sparks rise from the fluid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. BERSERKERS' CORRIDOR Lori sits, exhausted, in the corridor. She looks up to see Boone, with the knife still transfixing him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : My God...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Decker's dead. Take the knife out. Lori pulls the knife from him, and throws it down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [V.O.]: Boone!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Don't go...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : I'm. responsible. I have to. Lori and Boone head down the corridor, passing Ashberry, who is standing in the shadows. Lori and Boone head down the stairs towards the chamber.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. BAPHOMET'S CHAMBER Blinding light. As Boone descends into the chamber, he sees eight Nightbreed, surviving members of a Senior Council, Rachel among them, standing around Baphomet. They are wrapping severed limbs of Baphomet, preparing to include him in the exodus. His head and shoulders remain suspended in the light. Baphomet's lips move, making a terrible, eloquent sound. Rachel translates, the deep voice we hear coming from her lips.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Come closer... Boone obeys. Baphomet's remaining arm reaches down and holds Boone, as Baphomet's face stares down at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : ...You have destroyed our refuge...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : I never meant... Baphomet silences him. Boone trembles but maintains eye contact.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : This was foretold. No refuge is forever. But you are charged . . .
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Yes...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : ...You must rebuild what you've destroyed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Where?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : That you must find yourself. In the world above.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : I don't...I don't know how...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : You shall not be alone. You will find me there and heal me. [holds him close] You are not Boone... And now the words emerge from Baphomet himself, shaking the chamber.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : ...you are Cabal! Boone/Cabal is released. Baphomet is consumed in light. The Council move towards him to finish their task.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [O.S.]: Boone? Boone/Cabal turns; Lori stands at the bottom of the slope, offering a hand. He takes it, they start up the slope. Cowering in a niche inside the chamber, out of sight, watching in wonder is Ashberry. Transfixed by Baphomet, he crosses himself. Boone/Cabal glances back. The Council receive pieces of Baphomet from the light wrapping his smoking fragments in shrouds. The light builds to its brightest level. Pieces of ceiling begin to fall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. VARIOUS CHAMBERS The bowls start to explode with sparks of white light.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. BELOW MIDIAN Boone/Cabal and Lori race up towards the surface, as Midian continues to collapse around them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. BAPHOMET'S CHAMBER Ashberry descends the stairs into the blaze of light. Tears pour down his cheeks. He watches as the Council prepare to take down Baphomet's head. Near to him is one of the bowls of Baphomet's light. Ashberry approaches it, hungry for a taste of this glory. He reaches to touch the bowl. As he does so Baphomet's eyes fix on him. The bowl flips in the air. The fluid it holds rains down on Ashberry like acid. He falls back, his body smoking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NECROPOLIS NIGHT Boone/Cabal and Lori reach the surface and race through the ruined Necropolis, flames all around them. And then, behind them ...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. BAPHOMET'S CHAMBER The tentacles attached to Baphomet's head are detached. The blaze of light instantly begins to diminish...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. MIDIAN CORE The lights start to go out in the core, and earth begins to pour from the tunnels. We see it flood the various corridors, with a shuddering roar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. BAPHOMET'S CHAMBER We glimpse Baphomet's head being covered by the Council, as the roars increase...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. OUTSIDE THE GATES NIGHT Boone/Cabal and Lori find Joyce, holding Babette, protecting her, near the gates. Joyce steps back from the form of Rachel, who pulls her veils around her and holds out her arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Give me my child... Joyce looks at Lori, Boone/Cabal, at Babette and Rachel. He tenderly hands the child over. Rachel holds Babette and they both disappear into the darkness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [to Boone/Cabal]: ...I never understood...nobody ever told me... He steps away from them and the night engulfs him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. MIDIAN CORE The earth has almost obliterated the core entirely.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. OUTSIDE THE GATES NIGHT The roar ceases. Silence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NECROPOLIS Lori and Boone stand in the reeds as the last, bright bloom of the fires dies away on their faces. Figures move away through the smoke, creatures we recognize. The drummer beats out a tattoo as they depart. Narcisse appears from the darkness. As he does so, a final explosion roars up from the underground. In the smoke pillar above the site, Baphomet's image momentarily appears before the wind disperses it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Never piss off a God. Lori looks up into the sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Lori's P.O.V. of the sky, with other Breed, spirits of smoke and light, moving away into the night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Where are they going?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Any hiding place they can find. It'll be dawn soon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : When I need you where will I find you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : You'll find me. And you will need me. He reaches to shake Boone's hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Never touched a legend before. He laughs his manic laugh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [cont.] [to Lori]: Good night, pretty. He fades into the night, the laughter going with him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NEAR MIDIAN NIGHT In the distance, the burning ruins of Midian. The wind sighs in the moonlit reeds. Cabal and Lori reach the top of the hill, turn and look down, standing apart.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : I'll have to start tonight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : I'll go with you, Boone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : I'm not Boone, Lori. Do you understand? I belong to the Breed now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Then make me belong too; they made you one of them, you can do it to me...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : I can't...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : I want to be with you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : I'll come back for you when I'm finished...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : And when's that gonna be, when I'm ninety and you're still the way you are? I went through hell to find you and you just, just walk away from me? [pause; broken-hearted] Well go on, then, just go. Go on! What more do you want? Leave me some dignity, for Christ's sake! Pause. She turns away, trying not to show him her pain. Cabal turns to go. Lori turns back, sees him going. She can't bear it, looks around, sees Decker's briefcase lying beside the police car. Runs to it, finds a knife.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Boone! He turns. She puts the blade to her belly and drives it in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Lori, NO! She cries out and sinks to the ground in terrible pain. He reaches her and holds her in his arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : I lied, I lied, you're all I want.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Don't die, God, Lori, don't die...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Well why don't you do something about it, God damn it... remember what you said...[fading]...quickly... He raises her neck to his mouth. Her eyes flicker closed. He bites. A fatal, bloody kiss. He rises from her. Her eyes are closed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : ...too late?...Oh God, too late... Her eyes open. She's turned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : You said you'd never leave me. She grins, presses up to kiss his bloodied mouth. Camera moves up off them to find the moon and we:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. NECROPOLIS DAY We track through the ruins of the Necropolis. The walls are blackened by fires that are almost extinguished; corpses [human and Breed] lie in barely distinguishable bundles, from which partially cremated limbs jut. Smoke hangs in the air. From the distance we see Eigerman, going amongst the corpses, reclaiming guns, bullets and grenades. As we get closer we realize that he is a broken man, his face dirty, his eyes lunatic. He's been crying, the tracks marking the dirt. Suddenly, he hears a noise, and stands up to see a large figure appearing from the smoke. He goes for his own gun, levelling it at the figure as it approaches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Keep your distance! The figure keeps coming, emerging from the smoke. It's Ashberry. He has been transformed by the confrontation with Baphomet. His hair has been almost burned away entirely and there is a subtle reconfiguration in the shape of his skull. His clothes are in tatters. There are hints that his once broken body, poisoned by alcohol, has taken on new strength. He looks as insane as Eigerman, but stronger in his lunacy. There's a dangerous fervour in his eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : I saw their God...I saw him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : What the hell are you talking about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : I can still smell him. He's out there... Ashberry walks past Eigerman towards the exit from Necropolis.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : You mean you can find them?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Oh yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : We'll go together then. You can lead me to the bastards. Then I'll wipe them all away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : No. They're mine. Their God burned me. I want to burn him back. All of them. Burn them all away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : You can't, you don't have the wits ... Ashberry turns on him, his face wild. He takes hold of Eigerman by the neck, his fingers digging into the muscle. Blood runs. Eigerman tries to raise the gun but Ashberry takes hold of the man's hand, and summarily snaps his wrist. The gun is dropped. Ashberry starts to lift Eigerman up off the ground. The policeman's flailings stop suddenly. The head lolls. Ashberry flings the body aside, and starts out of the Necropolis. As he approaches the exit he looks up. Sunlight falls on his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. MOON NIGHT Shining, full. We move down to find a derelict barn, standing alone in a vast field.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . INT. BARN NIGHT We track through the darkness to find Rachel, Babette, Kinski and a number of other refugees and children of Midian, staring out at the night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : ...who will come for us?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : His name is Cabal. He unmade Midian.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : How soon?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : On the next wind. If not tonight, then tomorrow. Babette gazes out over the cornfields.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : On the next wind...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . EXT. HILL NIGHT Cabal and Lori, standing on the hill, against a background of stars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: [V.O.]: ...if not tonight...tomorrow...
direction.name: direction
